text: Donald Patrick "Don" Murray (July 31, 1929 – February 2, 2024) was an American actor. He was known for his role as Beauregard Decker in the 1956 movie Bus Stop. Murray starred in television series such as The Outcasts (1968–1969), Knots Landing (1979–1981), and Twin Peaks (2017). Murray died at his home in Goleta, California on February 2, 2024 at the age of 94. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1929 births Category:2024 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Hollywood
title: Don Murray
